name: Minesweeper (itch) (TheCyberTronn)
description:
Minesweeper is a free-to-play clone of the popular game, made in the Game Maker engine. This was a hobby project by myself, TheCyberTronn.

Features:

  • Addictive gameplay!
  • Three difficulties with a hard mode that can take hours to finish!
  • Infinite possibilities!
  • That satisfying feeling when you finally manage to clear a grid after working on it for over an hour and you jump up and down and have to tell everyone within a 20 foot radius!
  • ...and loads more!
